subject: Abbot Java GUI Testing Framework
msgSnippet: Now it s a lot easier (and a lot more fun) to test your Java GUI. Jumpstart at http://abbot.sourceforge.net. This is the first public release. You can get
messageBody:
Now it's a lot easier (and a lot more fun) to test your Java GUI.
Jumpstart at http://abbot.sourceforge.net

This is the first public release. You can get Abbot up and runing on
your app or GUI components in less than ten minutes, without writing any
new Java code. If not, be sure tell me why.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
